>>===== MODE =====>>
citation
<<===== MODE =====<<


>>===== RESULT =====>>
>>[0] chapter 10 r. 1-6
<<===== RESULT =====<<

>>===== CITATIONS =====>>
[
    [
        {
            "citationID": "CITATION-1", 
            "citationItems": [
                {
                    "id": "ITEM-1",
                    "locator": "ch. 10 r. 1-6",
                    "label": "page"
                }
            ], 
            "properties": {
                "noteIndex": 1
            }
        }, 
        [], 
        []
    ]
]
<<===== CITATIONS =====<<


>>===== CSL =====>>
<style 
      xmlns="http://purl.org/net/xbiblio/csl"
      class="note"
      version="1.0">
  <info>
    <id />
    <title />
    <updated>2009-08-10T04:49:00+09:00</updated>
  </info>
  <citation>
    <layout>
      <group delimiter=" ">
        <label variable="locator"/>
        <number variable="locator"/>
      </group>
    </layout>
  </citation>
</style>
<<===== CSL =====<<

>>===== INPUT =====>>
[
	{
		"id": "ITEM-1",
		"type": "book"
	}
]
<<===== INPUT =====<<
